mapper.select:
select cbId as cbId, aId as aId, mId as mId, tId as tId, cbMoney as cbMoney, cbOfferMoney as cbOfferMoney, cbPurchasetax as cbPurchasetax, cbJieSheng as cbJieSheng, cbColor as cbColor, cbPaiLiang as cbPaiLiang, cbBianSu as cbBianSu, cbDate as cbDate, cbLiCheng as cbLiCheng, cbNeiAndWai as cbNeiAndWai, cbBiaozhun as cbBiaozhun, cbCompulsoryTime as cbCompulsoryTime, cbValidity as cbValidity, cbPicture1 as cbPicture1, cbPicture2 as cbPicture2, cbPicture3 as cbPicture3, cbPicture4 as cbPicture4, cbDescribe as cbDescribe, cbPopular as cbPopular, cbTime as cbTime, cbRecommend as cbRecommend, uId as uId, cbState as cbState, cbName as cbName from carbuy
and cbId=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into carbuy( cbId, aId, mId, tId, cbMoney, cbOfferMoney, cbPurchasetax, cbJieSheng, cbColor, cbPaiLiang, cbBianSu, cbDate, cbLiCheng, cbNeiAndWai, cbBiaozhun, cbCompulsoryTime, cbValidity, cbPicture1, cbPicture2, cbPicture3, cbPicture4, cbDescribe, cbPopular, cbTime, cbRecommend, uId, cbState) values( #{cbId}, #{aId}, #{mId}, #{tId}, #{cbMoney}, #{cbOfferMoney}, #{cbPurchasetax}, #{cbJieSheng}, #{cbColor}, #{cbPaiLiang}, #{cbBianSu}, #{cbDate}, #{cbLiCheng}, #{cbNeiAndWai}, #{cbBiaozhun}, #{cbCompulsoryTime}, #{cbValidity}, #{cbPicture1}, #{cbPicture2}, #{cbPicture3}, #{cbPicture4}, #{cbDescribe}, #{cbPopular}, #{cbTime}, #{cbRecommend}, #{uId}, #{cbState})
mapper.update:
update carbuy
cbId=#{cbId},
aId=#{aId},
mId=#{mId},
tId=#{tId},
cbMoney=#{cbMoney},
cbOfferMoney=#{cbOfferMoney},
cbPurchasetax=#{cbPurchasetax},
cbJieSheng=#{cbJieSheng},
cbColor=#{cbColor},
cbPaiLiang=#{cbPaiLiang},
cbBianSu=#{cbBianSu},
cbDate=#{cbDate},
cbLiCheng=#{cbLiCheng},
cbNeiAndWai=#{cbNeiAndWai},
cbBiaozhun=#{cbBiaozhun},
cbCompulsoryTime=#{cbCompulsoryTime},
cbValidity=#{cbValidity},
cbPicture1=#{cbPicture1},
cbPicture2=#{cbPicture2},
cbPicture3=#{cbPicture3},
cbPicture4=#{cbPicture4},
cbDescribe=#{cbDescribe},
cbPopular=#{cbPopular},
cbTime=#{cbTime},
cbRecommend=#{cbRecommend},
uId=#{uId},
cbState=#{cbState}
